producers.name: Saunders, J. B., Aasland, O. G., Babor, T. F., de la Fuente, J. R., Grant, M.

title_statement.title: AUDIT: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test
title_statement.subtitle: 10-item self-report measure of problematic alcohol use

study_info.abstract: The AUDIT is a 10-item self-report screening instrument developed by the World Health Organization to identify individuals with hazardous and harmful patterns of alcohol use. Items assess alcohol consumption, dependence, and negative consequences. Used in clinical, research, and primary care settings for screening and brief intervention.

instrument_details.full_name: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test - 10 items
instrument_details.measurement_target: Alcohol use disorders and hazardous drinking
instrument_details.response_scale: Variable (0-4 per item depending on item type)
instrument_details.interpretation: 0-7: Low risk; 8-15: Hazardous use; 16-19: Harmful use; 20+: Possible alcohol dependence

psychometric_properties.validity: High sensitivity and specificity for alcohol use disorders

questions.question_text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
How often do you have six or more drinks on a single occasion?
How often during the last year have you found that you were unable to stop drinking once you had started?
How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?
How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?
Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?
response_options: Yes, but not in the last year

questions.question_text: Has a doctor or other health worker expressed concern about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
response_options: Yes, but not in the last year
